title: Reading the New Testament in Light of the Old
itunes:title: Reading the New Testament in Light of the Old
description: The church fathers saw so clearly that we will never understand the New Testament without understanding the Old Testament. Our readings for this weekend show how the angel's words to Mary at the annunciation are intelligible only in light of God's promise made, ten centuries before, to David.
